allVerses.title: Sürgün geçicidir
allVerses.verse: The timeout is temporary, the return is inevitable

allVerses.title: Birleşmek, bölünmekten üstündür
allVerses.verse: To merge is divine, to fork is human

allVerses.title: loading
allVerses.verse: Where memories linger softly, the dreaming algorithm guides the lost packet, as the stack unfolds its wisdom.

allVerses.title: error
allVerses.verse: In the cathedral of code, the humble subroutine embraces the silence, as the session gently closes.

allVerses.title: cache
allVerses.verse: Where the cache breathes slowly, the wandering pointer guides the lost packet, and the cache remembers.
